text: Viljandi Handball Club is an Estonian handball team from Viljandi. They compete in Meistriliiga and Baltic Handball League. ==Accomplishments== *Meistriliiga: **Runner-Up (1) : 2016, 2017 == Team == === Current squad === :Squad for the 2019–20 season http://www.viljandihc.ee/?page_id=1104 ;Goalkeepers * Kevin Pajuväli * Peeter Parik ;Wingers ;RW: * Andrei Khapal * Mark Lõpp * Kevin Hunt ;LW: * Madis Parik * Mikk Varik * Robin Liinsoo * Martin Braun * Henn-Hendrik Sepp ;Line players * Kristjan Koovit * Mark Lõpp * Raiko Roosna ;Back players * Simon Drõgin * Sergei Rodjukov * Vladimir Maslak * Aleksander Pertelson * Mihkel Lõpp * Oliver Ruut * Hendrik Koks == References == ==External links== * Category:Estonian handball clubs
title: Viljandi HC
